answerText: Unruh-Hawking effect [just say Unruh when giving the answer][10] The Unruh effect is related to this phenomenon, wherein blackbody radiation is emitted by blackholes. You can calculate it by combining the Schwarzschild radius and the Stefan-Boltzmann law.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 9 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This theoretical phenomenon states that an accelerating observer with a particle detector would observer black body radiation in the Rindler horizon. For 10 points each: [10] Name this result described by Fulling and Davies, but named for a Canadian physicist.
